title: Dyson Airstrait Hair Straightener - Ceramic Pink Rose Gold
description: This is a brand-new, unused, unopened, undamaged Dyson Airstrait Hair Straightener in its original packaging. It operates using electric power and is designed in a convenient travel size. The color is Pink, suitable for all hair types, and made with ceramic material. The model number is 401321-01, featuring a 1.5-inch barrel size. This straightener comes from the trusted Dyson brand and includes a lifetime manufacturer warranty. The heating plate material is Ceramic & Tourmaline, and it offers features like auto shut-off and adjustable heat settings with 3 temperature options. The model is Dyson Airstrait.
